issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
testharness won't run.  You can see in the trace the weird "Can't open dex cache 'Can't open dex cache '/data/dalvik-cache/mnt@sdcard@org.appcelerator.titanium.testharness@test.jar@classes.dex" message:

http://pastie.org/private/xxz6q5975ow82xe8qzaaq
fields.summary: Drillbit: Dex cache path problem on some Honeycomb tablets

comments.body: I wonder if this has something to with the SDCard not being mounted? Bill, can you try manually pushing something into /mnt/sdcard, and see if that gives any weird errors?
I was the only one affected by this, and it doesn't happen now that the G-Slate has 3.1 on it.
